title: sterculia foetida
Vernacular name:
English- Poon Tree
Hindi- Jangli badam
Gujarati-Jangli badam
Sanskrit-Vitkhadirah
Chemical Constituents: glycosides, flavones, quercetin, puerarin and methoxy flavones
Therapeutic uses: Used to stamina booster, cure diarrhea, treat hepatitis, relieve infections and anti-cancer..
